pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate Bayesian Multilevel Models for Compositional Data // Implement Bayesian Multilevel Modelling for compositional data in a multilevel framework. Compute multilevel compositional data and Isometric log ratio (ILR) at between and within-person levels, fit Bayesian multilevel models for compositional predictors and outcomes, and run post-hoc analyses such as isotemporal substitution models. References: Le, Stanford, Dumuid, and Wiley (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2405.03985, Le, Dumuid, Stanford, and Wiley (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2411.12407.
